items.sentence: It\'s a pity Tom doesn\'t know how to do that.
I asked him if he would go there the next day.
I know the girl you were talking to yesterday.
I know the situation is very difficult for us.
I know where Tom will be three hours from now.
I know you have somewhere else you need to be.
Tom was born in Australia on October 20, 2013.
Tom was obviously in a hurry to get that done.
Why are you here when you should be in school?
Why did you do that without telling Tom first?
